original_text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done, they were very sorry, and came and told unto their lord all that was done.
korean_text: 그 동료들이 그것을 보고 몹시 딱하게 여겨 주인에게 가서 그 일을 다 알리니

sentences.original_text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그의 동료 종들이 무슨 일이 있었는지 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: and came and told unto their lord
